00006 %! Add noise to the image.
00007 %
00008 % @param image matrix of the image
00009 % @param SNR signal to noise ratio (0~1)
00010 % @retval new_image new image loaded with noise
00011 
00012 function new_image = add_noise(image,SNR)
00013 
00014 [height width] = size(image);
00015 
00016 % support linear noise only.
00017 noise = (rand(height,width) *2 -1)*SNR;
00018 
00019 new_image = image + noise;
